RecoveryGuardianTitle: Select guardians to send recovery emails
NoAccountSignUp: Need an account? Sign up FREE
RegisterSubtitle: Please enter your email and password
VerifySubtitle: Please enter the verification code that was sent to {data}. The code is valid in 30 minutes.
SendAgain: Please send recovery email to the bot
RegisterEmailSame: Registered email has been the guardian
RecoveryEmailSame: This email has been set as guardian, please choose another one
NotSupport: Unsupported email suffix, please check the whitelist
LoginSubtitle: A Smart Contract Wallet with Email-based Social Recovery
RecoveryGuardianSubtitle: The social recovery will be completed after two guardians sending the recovery email
RegisterGuardianSubtitle: You can recover your account by sending emails from any 2 Guardians. Registered email would be the guardian by default, please add at least one more guardian.
SameDot: Please make sure the case and the “.” is the same as the actual email
SameCase: Please make sure the case is the same as the actual email
RequestsTooFrequent: Requests too frequent, please try again later
SystemBusy: System is busy, please try again later
SamePasswordToLogin: The same as the former password, please login
SameCaseDot: Please make sure the case and the “.” is the same as the actual email
RegisterTimeout: Network error or timeout, please try again later
RecoveryRestart: Network error or timeout, please try again later
SureLogOut: Are you sure you want to log out?
RecoverySuccessTip: You have successfully completed account recovery, please log in with your new password. There will be a 48 hours time-lock of the social recovery process when UniPass officially launched.
UniPassDKIM: UniPass implements secure and decentralized account recovery by verifying the DKIM signature via emails on the chain. Therefore, currently, UniPass account registration only supports large-scale email service providers with high credibility.
